info.name: Steelcase Leap Chair
info.description: •	Our #1 ergonomic office chair •	Patented LiveBack technology •	Amazing ergonomic comfort •	Refined, iconic design •	Natural Glide System •	Pneumatic seat height •	Adjustable arms •	Optional fully-adjustable matching headrest. Headrest is permanently fixed to chair back. •	Weight tested up to 300 pounds with no loss of performance
